price: (52) Those to whom We gave the Scripture before it - they[1111] are believers in it.
arabic: ٱلَّذِينَ ءَاتَيۡنَٰهُمُ ٱلۡكِتَٰبَ مِن قَبۡلِهِۦ هُم بِهِۦ يُؤۡمِنُونَ
footnotes: [1111]- i.e., the sincere believers among them.

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: alladhīna ātaynāhumu al-kitāba min qablihi hum bihi yu'minūna
